Description: Fragment of incurving rim and body of North Ionian(?) pottery bird bowl; interior glazed thick dark brown; exterior: part of a bird with hatched body; top of rim glazed.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 46.2.7)
Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p. 255, no. 10)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.080)
